720238f-a.title: Manhattan: Greenwich Street - Clarkson Street
720238f-a.text:
Greenwich Street, north from Clarkson Street, showing
surface conditions under the Ninth Avenue Elevated. The
street car tracks shown are to be removed by the W. P. A.
Intersection in the midgrouno is Leroy Street. This location
personally verified on 9-261940.
June 2, 1937
W. P. A. photo
Five Boroughs Project
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
